reviewText: Big Heather Hunter fan.  Something special about her.  Now she's into music.  Doesn;'t sound too bad.  Lovely lady to talk to who is also on Social network.
Was okay arrived as excepted thought the action would be better need more scenes with her in them for the true Heather fan

"Heather Hunter 21st Century Urban Icon" Is A Nice DVD. Although It Looks Like Is Was Bumped Up From VHS Quality Transfer, It Still A Good Video To Watch Heather Hunter At Her Best. This Movie Is A Classic For Any Collector Of Adult Films.
I love this video I always love Heather Hunter! Heather Hunter is one of the Greats porn stars of the 20th Century. I think she in the top 10 Porn Stars of all time.

If you are a fan of former Adult Film star Heather Hunter and want to see her origins, then get this film as this was her VERY first movie. In legend, she did this movie on her 18th birthday (which is Oct. 1st).

Her movies tended to be different than most adult films because hers was closer to "erotica" than smut. On a personal level, I have to give her credit because after watching this movie, I also saw a few recent pictures of her (she does mostly photography and hip-hop music these days) and not much has changed! She's certainly held up better than most of her fellow porn actors and actresses. In her early 40's, she could easily still do it if she wanted to but I give her credit for trying to move away from that period of her life and show that she's more than just someone who took her clothes off and had sex on camera.

I will end this review by saying THIS IS DEFINITELY FOR ADULTS! Put it this way, this isn't even an NC-17 party here!

I liked nothing about it.. says it's new. Not true it's a cdr. Poor quality, looks like her and her neighbors got together with there 1980's video recorder and tried to do what the big boys do. Terrible color, grainy picture quality, and not very well done. I put it where it could do the most good. IN THE GARBAGE!!!!
